fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: EuMEP is a small and independent NGO/think-tank in Brussels that closely monitors policy of the EU and European governments on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. EuMEP promotes a just and effective policy towards both sides of the conflict based on the respect for international law and equal human dignity for all Israelis and Palestinians. EuMEP combines analytical work and advocacy, working closely with a number of other leading NGOs and experts.
relevant_communication: 'Six EU double standards on Israel', EUobserver, https://euobserver.com/opinion/132361
